3rd Party Memory Boards  

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

Microtek AMB32 - Box

Microtek AMB-32 - Front

Microtek AMB-32 - Back

 

The Microtek AMB-32 is a 32k Memory board for the Atari 800 and can reside is Slots 1 through 3 in the system.  It was specifically advertised as a way of having 48k in only 2 slots leaving the 3rd open for other board options.

The single sheet instructions outline its purpose, usage, covers returns & warranty. CLICK HERE
